market_scaling_fractions_source.notes: Heating multiples were determined as proportion of total homes with electric non-HP heating that have both cooling and heating systems in each BA climate zone. Cooling multiple of 31% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a cooling system (16,171 homes) where there is heating via electricity (heating = 1 AND main space heating fuel =5) 5,046 homes.
